resources.string: Welcome to Music_App! My name is Saeed Darvish and I designed this app. This app is a perfect place for enjoying your type of music. !
In this screen.the user can View the song that is currently being played
In this screen.the user can View the Album
In this screen includes the image and name of singer being played
In this screen you can add new songs to your app with pay 10 $
With Payment Button you can add new songs to your app!
1- Please push Add to Cart button
